content: the crocus hat is worked in the round from the bottom up it begins with a knit 1 purl 1 ribbing at the brim and then a fun dandelion pattern is worked around the body of the hat decreases are integrated into the stitch pattern to shape the crown the cashmere and mohair are held together throughout the hat is designed to have a folded brim you may wish to keep the brim unfolded for a slouchier look
